SELECT A.product_id productid,A.p_name NAME,D.img img,A.p_price price,F.cate_id cateId FROM product A left JOIN product_allergy B ON A.product_id = B.product_id left JOIN allergy C on C.allergy_id = B.allergy_id LEFT JOIN product_thumbnail D ON D.product_id = A.product_id LEFT JOIN product_category_relation F ON A.product_id = F.product_id WHERE p_name LIKE '%${word}%' and p_name REGEXP #{msg} AND A.p_quantity !=0 AND A.is_delete = 0 AND D.img is not null
AND A.product_id NOT IN(SELECT product_id FROM product_allergy WHERE allergy_id in(${allergy}))
GROUP BY A.product_id
ORDER BY A.sale_volume DESC
ORDER BY A.sale_volume
ORDER BY A.p_price DESC
ORDER BY A.p_price
LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{row}

SELECT count(DISTINCT A.product_id) FROM product A left join product_allergy B on A.product_id=B.product_id LEFT JOIN product_thumbnail C ON A.product_id = C.product_id LEFT JOIN product_category_relation D ON A.product_id = D.product_id where A.p_quantity!=0 AND A.is_delete=0 and A.p_name LIKE '%${word}%' AND A.p_name REGEXP #{msg} AND C.img is not null
AND A.product_id NOT IN(SELECT product_id FROM product_allergy WHERE allergy_id in(${allergy}))
AND D.cate_id IS NOT null
